solution_line_template: After one year it earns $10 in interest because {initial_deposit} x {interest_rate} = <<{initial_deposit}*{interest_rate}={first_year_interest}>>{first_year_interest}
It has $120 in it after a year because {initial_deposit} + {first_year_interest} + {annual_deposit} = <<{initial_deposit}+{first_year_interest}+{annual_deposit}={first_year_total}>>{first_year_total}
In the second year it earns $12 in interest because {first_year_total} x {interest_rate} = <<{first_year_total}*{interest_rate}={second_year_interest}>>{second_year_interest}

In the second year it has $142 in it because {first_year_total} + {second_year_interest} + {annual_deposit} = <<{first_year_total}+{second_year_interest}+{annual_deposit}={second_year_total}>>{second_year_total}
